headline: LyondellBasell (LYB) Losses Deepen 24.8% Annually, Challenging Recovery Narrative Despite Profit Turnaround Forecast
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (LYB) reported widening losses, with annual losses increasing by 24.8% per year over the past five years. Available forecasts expect revenue to decline 7.1% each year for the next three years, even as analysts see annual earnings rebounding at a pace of 52.66%, with a return to profitability anticipated in the same period. See our full analysis for LyondellBasell Industries. Next, we'll see how these headline results compare with the prevailing narratives and...

headline: Does the Recent 6% Drop Make LyondellBasell a Value Opportunity in 2025?
summary: If you have ever looked at LyondellBasell Industries and wondered if now is the right time to jump in, you are not alone. Many investors are on the hunt for value in this stock. After a drop of 2.5% over the past week and a sharper 6.2% slide across the last month, LyondellBasell’s stock price has turned some heads, especially given its long-term decline of 41.8% over the past year. Recent headlines have highlighted shifts in global chemical demand and talk of industry consolidation, both...
